GSD.product_version: versions from v3.14 to before v6.0.7
GSD.description:
openvswitch: switch from WARN to pr_warn

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.7 by commit 7bd495f6d2ccfae3951de2e88afdeb636a4737e2, it was introduced in version v3.14 by commit 44da5ae5fbea4686f667dc854e5ea16814e44c59. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: openvswitch: switch from WARN to pr_warn
OSV.details:
